bibl.title: Wednesday's Child is Full of Woe or: The Seven Deadly Sins and Some More Too! (Another Apotelesmatikon: P. Med. inv. 71.58.) (Nilus. 1.)

publisher.orgName: OVG. Österreichische Verlagsgesellschaft C. & E. Dworak

bibl.biblScope: 3 figg. et 4 pll. n./bl. et 4 pll. coul.
bibl.note: An iconographical and philological study tracing the birth and development of the Seven Deadly Sins from their Babylonian forebears up to their present-day forms in modern art based on a new interpretation of P. Med. Inv. 71.58 (= S.B. XVIII, 12222).
